name: Claude Desktop
description: Anthropic's official desktop client for Claude
manual_instructions:
To manually configure Claude Desktop:
1. Open your Claude Desktop config file (claude_desktop_config.json)
2. Add the following to 'mcpServers':
   "mcp-scooter": {
     "type": "sse",
     "url": "http://localhost:6277/profiles/{profile}/sse"
   }
